1370: Amilius moved to Op Havick1.A.14 after marriage.
Got married to Salome at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Salome, Agnes, at age 23.
1372: Had a son with Salome, Herbert, at age 24.
1375: Had a son with Salome, Walramus, at age 27.
1380: Had a daughter with Salome, Flore, at age 32.
1381: Lost his wife Salome while she was giving birth to Saxiardis in 1381.
Became caretaker of Agnes, Herbert, Walramus, Flore, Saxiardis at age 34.
1388: Lost son Herbert when Herbert was 17 years old.
